english.segment1: I was born in Tennessee. Late July humidity. Doctor said I was lucky to be alive
english.segment2: Ive been trouble since the day that I got here. Trouble till the day that I disappear. Thatll be the day that I finally get it right
english.segment3: There is hope for me yet. Because God wont forget. All the plans hes made for me. I have to wait and see. Hes not finished with me yet
english.segment4: I never really was that good in school. I talked too much, broke the rules. Teacher thought I was hopeless fool alright
english.segment5: I dont know how but I made it through. Its one of those things that youve gotta do. But I always had a knack for telling the truth
english.segment7: Still wondering why Im here. Still wrestling with my fear. But oh, Hes up to something. And the farther on I go. Ive seen enough to know. That Im, not here for nothing. Hes up to something
english.segment8: So nows my time to be a man. Follow my heart as far as I can. No telling where Im ending up tonight. I never slow down or so it seems. But singing my heart its one of my dreams. All I gotta do is hold on tight
